Class AbstractAdminClient

java.lang.Object
net.greghaines.jesque.admin.AbstractAdminClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
AdminClient
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdminClientImpl, AdminClientPoolImpl
public abstract class AbstractAdminClient extends Object implements AdminClient
Common logic for AdminClient implementations.
Author:
Greg Haines

    • shutdownWorkers

      public void shutdownWorkers(boolean now)
      Send a shutdown command on the ResqueConstants.ADMIN_CHANNEL channel.
      Specified by:
      shutdownWorkers in interface AdminClient
      Parameters:
      now - if true, an effort will be made to stop any job in progress

    • shutdownWorkers

      public void shutdownWorkers(String channel, boolean now)
      Send a shutdown command on the given channel.
      Specified by:
      shutdownWorkers in interface AdminClient
      Parameters:
      channel - the channel to publish the pause command to
      now - if true, an effort will be made to stop any job in progress

    • togglePausedWorkers

      public void togglePausedWorkers(boolean paused)
      Send a pause command on the ResqueConstants.ADMIN_CHANNEL channel.
      Specified by:
      togglePausedWorkers in interface AdminClient
      Parameters:
      paused - if true, the workers will not process any new jobs; if false, the workers will process new jobs

    • togglePausedWorkers

      public void togglePausedWorkers(String channel, boolean paused)
      Send a pause command on the given channel.
      Specified by:
      togglePausedWorkers in interface AdminClient
      Parameters:
      channel - the channel to publish the pause command to
      paused - if true, the workers will not process any new jobs; if false, the workers will process new jobs

    • doPublish

      protected abstract void doPublish(String queue, String msg) throws Exception
      Actually publish the serialized job.
      Parameters:
      queue - the queue to add the Job to
      msg - the serialized Job
      Throws:
      Exception - in case something goes wrong

    • doPublish

      public static void doPublish(AbstractAdminClient.Publisher jedis, String namespace, String channel, String jobJson)
      Helper method that encapsulates the minimum logic for publishing a job to a channel.
      Parameters:
      jedis - the connection to Redis
      namespace - the Resque namespace
      channel - the channel name
      jobJson - the job serialized as JSON
